name: Prabhav Shrestha
title: Full-Stack Software Engineer
summary: Passionate full-stack software engineer with 5+ years of experience building scalable web applications. Skilled in modern JavaScript/TypeScript ecosystems, cloud infrastructure, and agile development. Proven track record of delivering high-quality products in fast-paced startup environments.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
highlights: Led development of a real-time analytics dashboard serving 50K+ daily active users using React, Next.js, and PostgreSQL.
Designed and implemented a microservices architecture that reduced API response times by 40%.
Mentored a team of 4 junior developers through code reviews, pair programming, and technical design sessions.
Introduced automated testing pipelines with Jest and Cypress, increasing code coverage from 45% to 85%.
Collaborated with product and design teams to ship 12 major features in 2023.

experience.title: Full-Stack Developer
highlights: Built the company's core SaaS platform from scratch using React, Node.js, and MongoDB.
Implemented Stripe payment integration handling $2M+ annual recurring revenue.
Developed a RESTful API consumed by web and mobile clients with 99.9% uptime.
Optimized database queries reducing page load times by 60%.
Managed AWS infrastructure including EC2, RDS, S3, and CloudFront.

experience.title: Junior Web Developer
highlights: Developed responsive websites for 15+ clients using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and WordPress.
Created custom React components for an internal design system.
Collaborated with UX designers to translate Figma mockups into pixel-perfect interfaces.
Participated in agile sprints and daily stand-ups.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
highlights: Senior thesis: 'Optimizing Real-Time Data Pipelines for Web Applications'
Teaching Assistant for CS 61A (Structure and Interpretation of Computer Programs)

projects.name: OpenBoard
projects.description: An open-source collaborative whiteboard app built with Next.js, Socket.IO, and Canvas API. 500+ GitHub stars.

projects.name: DevTracker
projects.description: A CLI tool for tracking developer productivity metrics across Git repositories. Published on npm with 1,000+ weekly downloads.
